sentences.english: Universal education means85percent school-aged children could receive ninew-year universal education.
sentences.chinese: 普九，即为85%适龄儿童能够接受到九年义务教育。

sentences.english: Transaction processing is completed the day value date.
sentences.chinese: 交易处理完成的那天即为起息日。

sentences.english: Their Progenitor was Galatea, the woman created by Pygmalion .
sentences.chinese: 其先祖即为葛拉蒂，由皮格马利翁所创造的美女。

sentences.english: "Billionaire Tycoon", which will go on sale this autumn, is one engaging example.
sentences.chinese: 今秋开卖的“亿万富豪”即为明例。
